turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Yeah. I'd like to order coffee from Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. what peets did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From the 18th and 18th Street in Castro in San Francisco, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a medium ice vanilla latte, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream or syrups?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what milk did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a medium iced vanilla latte with whipped cream and nonfat milk from the peets on 18th and castro in San Francisco.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the receipt via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a nice day.
